means: 引起杂音的收音机，大挫折

sentence.Network_en: Boy, did my boss make a blooper today!

derivation.yuyuan_name: 1926 (originally US, denoting a radio which caused others to bloop, e. g. emit a loud howling noise): from imitative bloop + -er

entry.def: A blooper is a silly mistake.
